control.visible: Skin.Hassetting(listcdart) + IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) + !IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(poster)) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting) + !SubString(ListItem.Path,videodb://movies/sets) + Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting) + Skin.HasSetting(fakehanddisccolor)
